CustomField.formula: CASE( MOD( Start_Date__c - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, (Start_Date__c ) + 30 + FLOOR((30-1)/5)*2, 1, (Start_Date__c ) + 30 + FLOOR((30)/5)*2, 2, (Start_Date__c ) + 30 + FLOOR((30+1)/5)*2, 3, (Start_Date__c ) + 30 + FLOOR((30+2)/5)*2, 4, (Start_Date__c ) + 30 + FLOOR((30+3)/5)*2, 5, (Start_Date__c ) + 30 + CEILING((30)/5)*2, 6, (Start_Date__c ) - IF(30>0,1,0) + 30 + CEILING((30)/5)*2, null)
CustomField.label: Parts Manual Due Date
